alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 12:47PM MDT until May 17 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 145 PM MDT. * At 1246 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Hisega, or 5 miles west of Rapid City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rapid City, western Rapid Valley, Johnson Siding, Hisega, Hart Ranch and Reptile Gardens. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 55 and 62. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
